issue.title: [JS] Read streaming format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-872](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-872). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Provide an interface for reading the streaming format defined in ARROW-474

comments.body:
